appetizers.name: Buffalo Wings
appetizers.description: Chicken wings covered in buffalo sauce.

cold sandwiches.name: Peanut Butter & Jelly
cold sandwiches.description: A basic peanut butter and jelly sandwich on wheat bread.

cold sandwiches.name: Club Sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: Club Sandwich with lettuce, tomatoes, and turkey on white bread.

hot sandwiches.name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
hot sandwiches.description: Pulled pork covered in BBQ sauce on a potato bun.

hot sandwiches.name: Grilled Cheese
hot sandwiches.description: A basic grilled cheese sandwich on french bread. Just like mom used to make!

desserts.name: Cheesecake
desserts.description: Cheesecake straight out of New York.

desserts.name: Ice Cream
desserts.description: Philadelphia Style Ice Cream made with milk, sugar, and many assorted flavorings. It's a classic you will want to enjoy.

drinks.name: Soda
drinks.description: Carbonated drink with many artificial flavors. Fizzy!

drinks.name: Fruit Smoothie
drinks.description: Bananas and Strawberries blended straight from the smoothie. Yum!
